sentences.en: " You shouldn't be so pessimistic, Cousin Mei.
sentences.cn: “ 梅姐,你这样悲观, 真不该.

sentences.en: After the pessimistic sales forecasts, production was halved.
sentences.cn: 在做了悲观销售预测之后, 产量降低了一半.

sentences.en: Don't be so pessimistic, this is not like you.
sentences.cn: 不要这样的悲观, 这不象你这种人.

sentences.en: Hardy has often been criticised for an excessively pessimistic view of life.
sentences.cn: 哈代由于对生活持过度悲观的态度而常常受到批评。

sentences.en: He had become pessimistic about the war and about his own career as well.
sentences.cn: 他对于战局是悲观的,对于自己前途也是悲观的.

sentences.en: He tried hard to shut all pessimistic thoughts out of his mind.
sentences.cn: 他努力从头脑中排除一切悲观的想法.

sentences.en: I'm a little pessimistic about our team's chances.
sentences.cn: 我对我们队获胜的机会并不看好.

sentences.en: My neighbours are very pessimistic, and can not have the apple here in theory this year.
sentences.cn: 我的邻居很悲观, 说今年这儿将不会有苹果了.

sentences.en: The voters are pessimistic about the economy.
They appeared surprisingly pessimistic about their chances of winning.
sentences.cn: 他们对胜利的可能性显得出奇地悲观。

sentences.en: This is too pessimistic a view.
This pessimistic attitude was flatly repudiated by the Navy.
sentences.cn: 此种悲观主义的倾向,却不折不扣地被海军排斥.

sentences.en: To tell you the truth, I'm rather pessimistic about everything.
sentences.cn: 说实话, 我对一切都相当悲观.

sentences.en: We are optimistic, we shall never become pessimistic or despairing.
sentences.cn: 我们决不悲观失望, 我们是乐观的.

sentences.en: You always look on the dark side of things, ie are always pessimistic.
sentences.cn: 你总是着眼于事物的黑暗面(总是悲观).

words.tran_cn: 悲观，悲观情绪；厌世主义

trans.tran_cn: 悲观的，厌世的，悲观主义的
trans.tran_en: expecting that bad things will happen in the future or that something will have a bad result
